subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Sports Injuries
Deaths (Fatalities)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The teammates of Wouter Weylandt, the Belgian cyclist who was killed in a crash Monday, crossed the finish line side by side and with arms linked to honor him at the Giro d’Italia.
snippet: The teammates of Wouter Weylandt, the Belgian cyclist who was killed in a crash Monday, crossed the finish line side by side and with arms linked to honor him at the Giro d’Italia.
